author: Ryan Daws
description:
Vitalik Buterin, the mind behind the Ethereum blockchain, has performed a U-turn and now advocates for copyleft licensing in Web3 development. In a candid blog post, Buterin walks readers through his journey from someone who championed giving code away freely to someone who now believes developers need to be a bit more demanding about what... Read more »

The post Web3 needs copyleft licensing, says Ethereum founder appeared first on Developer Tech News.
title: Web3 needs copyleft licensing, says Ethereum founder

author: Muhammad Zulhusni
description:
Huawei’s newest large language model, Pangu Pro MoE 72B, was released under an open-source license in late June. A week later, the company found itself accused of copying parts of a rival model made by Alibaba. The allegation came from a little-known entity called HonestAGI, which posted a research paper on GitHub. It claimed Huawei’s... Read more »

The post Huawei denies Pangu model was based on Alibaba’s Qwen appeared first on Developer Tech News.
title: Huawei denies Pangu model was based on Alibaba’s Qwen
